title: Western Secularism is Christianity Lite, JBP, Steven Pinker, Tom Holland
description:
Telos is the Achilles Heal of all modernistic systems. Can we navigate without guiding stars outside the iron box of secularism? Jordan Peterson and Steven Pinker begin talking how nations can resist ethno-nationalism but Peterson quickly brings in Ben Shapiro and his claims about a Judeo-Christian tradition as essential for understanding the Enlightenment project. 

Tom Holland's new book Dominion is about to be published and his research brought him to some new realizations about the root of the West's assumed morality. Secularity is in many ways Christianity lite in the West but can it hold if divorced from its roots?
